text: Hello, have you heard of the organization Save the Children?
Hell, how are you? Yes I've heard about it
I am doing quite fine, yourself?
I am fine thanks. Would you please tell me more about it?
Sure thing are you interested in more of their US or global activities?
I prefer to know about their international activities, if they are international
They are. The overarching goal is to reach children that are the most vulnerable. The organization works in over 120 countries around the world.
That is so interesting, what are the main issues they work on?

Essentially anything that affects a child. Their healthcare initiative focuses on vaccine preventable illnesses. They also have education and food focuses as well as an emergency division. Do one of those sound interesting to you?
All of them sounds interesting, I mean I have a soft heart for children. are they clear with their financial reports?
Yes, according to give.org they receive top marks on charity accountability.
That's awesome, do they accept volunteers? I do not have many off days but they idea would be nice
There are opportunities to participate in events and advocacy and an e-mail sign up to keep in tune with the organization's activities.
that is so nice. do they have any website that I can visit?
URL  The email sign up is at the bottom of the page. In addition, you can donate part of your payment today to the organization if interested.
Thanks for the information. I would like to know if the big companies cooperate with them?

Interesting you ask that. There is an employee matching program where individuals who work at companies will donate some amount of money and companies pledge to match. Take a moment to peruse the website and see if you would like to donate.Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment ($2).
I know and I will donate
Great! It is a great organization in 2017 86% of every dollar raised went to helping children around the world.
That is good, I sure will help and I will visit the website to help later. I mean if it is ethical organization I will donate monthly
That is good. Check it out and hopefully you find some way to transform a child's life for the better.
Thanks have a nice day
You as well.
